actions.args: {"body": {"name": "dAGI House hackathon by cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund & Epic Web3", "summary": "\\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' is an offline hackathon dedicated to AI & Web3. At the event, builders will create autonomous agents and interfaces for on-chain interactions, develop natural language or voice-enabled intents for wallet tasks, use AI to enhance security and automate auditing, and more. \\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' sponsors, speakers, and mentors come from such companies as Galadriel, Nevermined, Marlin, 0G Labs, Mistral AI, MBD.XYZ, M31 Capital, Corcel, Naptha ai, Allora, Robot VC, Chainbase, Pond, Lido, & others.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "The dAGI House hackathon is an event designed for developers, builders, and researchers in the decentralized AI space. Our main goal is to promote deAI technologies among innovators by providing a collaborative platform to brainstorm, build, and showcase deAI projects. The event will feature three days of in-person activities in Brussels on July 5-7, preceded by an online pre-conference and workshop series from June 11 to July 2.\\\\n\\\\nSince 2014, cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund has worked with leading crypto teams and actively contributed to projects such as P2P.org, =nil; Foundation, and the Lido DAO. cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund assists with everything from operational and technological decisions to security and research questions, helping companies go from zero to one. cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund\\\\u{2019}s mission is to accelerate the transition to an open cybernetic economy by backing entrepreneurs innovating at the intersection of blockchain, artificial intelligence, robotics and adjacent technologies.\\\\n\\\\nEpic Web3 is a dedicated team with many years of experience in crafting conferences and building communities. In the past year, Epic Web3 hosted 10+ events for Web3 developers across cities like New York, Denver, Istanbul, Paris, Seoul, Lisbon, London, and Dubai as well as two big online summits for AI developers.\\\\n\\\\nThe dAGI Hack will strengthen the global impact of deAI technologies. The prize pool of the hackathon will be partially allocated to granting travel scholarships for the best hackers who will be travelling from far away to join the hackathon. The project focuses on use cases like autonomous agents, data pipelines, decentralized infrastructure, and many more practical AI & Web3 applications. This initiative will contribute to the development of self-sovereign data and identity for AI, programmable incentives for ML research, and AI-powered solutions for Web3 applications.\\\\n\\\\nWe expect to attract over 100 offline participants, including hackers, builders, founders, and researchers. Our goal is to see the development of numerous decentralized AI projects, with at least ten standout projects receiving recognition. Apart from the general prize, the event will feature multiple prizes from sponsors for the best use of their technology, fostering a competitive and innovative spirit among participants.\\\\n\\\\nProjects will be evaluated based on the market potential and product innovation. Specific criteria will include the technical complexity of the project, the feasibility and scalability of the solution, and the overall impact on the decentralized AI and Web3 communities.\\\\n\\\\nMore details about the hackathon\\\\\\'s mission and program here : https://www.notion.so/epicweb3/dAGI-House-AI-Web3-hackathon-2a3f80d3d917412bbcae00c6e40908dd?pvs=4", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "928cadd6664180c00df00abff1c552815707fca3e1baf3c5047a1e9852fdecac", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "9500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}

At the event, builders will create autonomous agents and interfaces for on-chain interactions, develop natural language or voice-enabled intents for wallet tasks, use AI to enhance security and automate auditing, and more. \\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' sponsors, speakers, and mentors come from such companies as Galadriel, Nevermined, Marlin, 0G Labs, Mistral AI, MBD.XYZ, M31 Capital, Corcel, Naptha ai, Allora, Robot VC, Chainbase, Pond, Lido, & others.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=18)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 18, "snapshot": {"name": "dAGI House hackathon by cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund & Epic Web3", "labels": ["Hackathon"], "summary": "\\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' is an offline hackathon dedicated to AI & Web3. At the event, builders will create autonomous agents and interfaces for on-chain interactions, develop natural language or voice-enabled intents for wallet tasks, use AI to enhance security and automate auditing, and more. \\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' sponsors, speakers, and mentors come from such companies as Galadriel, Nevermined, Marlin, 0G Labs, Mistral AI, MBD.XYZ, M31 Capital, Corcel, Naptha ai, Allora, Robot VC, Chainbase, Pond, Lido, & others.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "928cadd6664180c00df00abff1c552815707fca3e1baf3c5047a1e9852fdecac", "timestamp": "1719309752017801804", "supervisor": null, "description": "The dAGI House hackathon is an event designed for developers, builders, and researchers in the decentralized AI space. Our main goal is to promote deAI technologies among innovators by providing a collaborative platform to brainstorm, build, and showcase deAI projects. The event will feature three days of in-person activities in Brussels on July 5-7, preceded by an online pre-conference and workshop series from June 11 to July 2.\\\\n\\\\nSince 2014, cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund has worked with leading crypto teams and actively contributed to projects such as P2P.org, =nil; Foundation, and the Lido DAO. cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund assists with everything from operational and technological decisions to security and research questions, helping companies go from zero to one. cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund\\\\u{2019}s mission is to accelerate the transition to an open cybernetic economy by backing entrepreneurs innovating at the intersection of blockchain, artificial intelligence, robotics and adjacent technologies.\\\\n\\\\nEpic Web3 is a dedicated team with many years of experience in crafting conferences and building communities. In the past year, Epic Web3 hosted 10+ events for Web3 developers across cities like New York, Denver, Istanbul, Paris, Seoul, Lisbon, London, and Dubai as well as two big online summits for AI developers.\\\\n\\\\nThe dAGI Hack will strengthen the global impact of deAI technologies. The prize pool of the hackathon will be partially allocated to granting travel scholarships for the best hackers who will be travelling from far away to join the hackathon. The project focuses on use cases like autonomous agents, data pipelines, decentralized infrastructure, and many more practical AI & Web3 applications. This initiative will contribute to the development of self-sovereign data and identity for AI, programmable incentives for ML research, and AI-powered solutions for Web3 applications.\\\\n\\\\nWe expect to attract over 100 offline participants, including hackers, builders, founders, and researchers. Our goal is to see the development of numerous decentralized AI projects, with at least ten standout projects receiving recognition. Apart from the general prize, the event will feature multiple prizes from sponsors for the best use of their technology, fostering a competitive and innovative spirit among participants.\\\\n\\\\nProjects will be evaluated based on the market potential and product innovation. Specific criteria will include the technical complexity of the project, the feasibility and scalability of the solution, and the overall impact on the decentralized AI and Web3 communities.\\\\n\\\\nMore details about the hackathon\\\\\\'s mission and program here : https://www.notion.so/epicweb3/dAGI-House-AI-Web3-hackathon-2a3f80d3d917412bbcae00c6e40908dd?pvs=4", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "928cadd6664180c00df00abff1c552815707fca3e1baf3c5047a1e9852fdecac", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "9500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "928cadd6664180c00df00abff1c552815707fca3e1baf3c5047a1e9852fdecac", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"id": 18, "body": {"name": "dAGI House hackathon by cyber\\\\u{2022}Fund & Epic Web3", "summary": "\\\\\\'dAGI House\\\\\\' is an offline hackathon dedicated to AI & Web3. In the past year, Epic Web3 hosted 10+ events for Web3 developers across cities like New York, Denver, Istanbul, Paris, Seoul, Lisbon, London, and Dubai as well as two big online summits for AI developers.\\\\n\\\\nThe dAGI Hack will strengthen the global impact of deAI technologies. The prize pool of the hackathon will be partially allocated to granting travel scholarships for the best hackers who will be travelling from far away to join the hackathon. The project focuses on use cases like autonomous agents, data pipelines, decentralized infrastructure, and many more practical AI & Web3 applications. This initiative will contribute to the development of self-sovereign data and identity for AI, programmable incentives for ML research, and AI-powered solutions for Web3 applications.\\\\n\\\\nWe expect to attract over 100 offline participants, including hackers, builders, founders, and researchers. Our goal is to see the development of numerous decentralized AI projects, with at least ten standout projects receiving recognition. Apart from the general prize, the event will feature multiple prizes from sponsors for the best use of their technology, fostering a competitive and innovative spirit among participants.\\\\n\\\\nProjects will be evaluated based on the market potential and product innovation. Specific criteria will include the technical complexity of the project, the feasibility and scalability of the solution, and the overall impact on the decentralized AI and Web3 communities.\\\\n\\\\nMore details about the hackathon\\\\\\'s mission and program here : https://www.notion.so/epicweb3/dAGI-House-AI-Web3-hackathon-2a3f80d3d917412bbcae00c6e40908dd?pvs=4", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "928cadd6664180c00df00abff1c552815707fca3e1baf3c5047a1e9852fdecac", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "9500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}

{"body": {"name": "HOT App Hackathon - Integrating Innovation", "summary": "The HOT App Hackathon aims to foster innovation and creativity within the developer community by challenging participants to create functional and creative apps that integrate with the HOT App on Telegram. By providing a platform for developers to showcase their skills and collaborate, we aim to enhance the HOT App ecosystem with new features that improve communication, productivity, and social interaction. ", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "\\\\n# 1. Hackathon Overview\\\\n**Title:** HOT App Hackathon - Integrating Innovation\\\\n\\\\n**Date & Format:**\\\\n\\\\nProposed Dates: July 8, 2024 - August 07, 2024\\\\nFormat: Online\\\\nLocation:\\\\n\\\\n**Online Platform: ** HOT App Telegram Group and Dedicated Hackathon Website (PitchTalk)\\\\n\\\\n# 2. Organizing Team\\\\n**Organizers:**\\\\n\\\\nKarym Abdelrakhman: Lead Organizer, CEO of PitchTalk. Web3 Enthusiast with over 5 years of experience building web3 application. For the past 3 years built 2 apps based on Near blockchain. \\\\n\\\\n**Partnerships:**\\\\n\\\\nPitchTalk: Main sponsor and platform provider.\\\\nDevHub: Technical support and community outreach.\\\\n\\\\n# 3. Event Objectives\\\\n**Goals:**\\\\n\\\\n1. Foster innovation and creativity in app development.\\\\n2. Involve new developers into Near ecosystem.\\\\n3. Integrate winning app into the HOT App on Telegram.\\\\n4. Engage the tech community and encourage collaboration.\\\\n\\\\n**Target Audience:**\\\\n\\\\nTech enthusiasts, developers, and innovators globally.\\\\n\\\\n# 4. Challenges & Themes\\\\n**Details:**\\\\n\\\\nMain Challenge: Develop a functional and creative app that can be integrated into HOT App on Telegram.\\\\nThemes: Communication enhancements, productivity tools, and social interaction features.\\\\n\\\\n# 5. Schedule and Activities\\\\nDuration (including all hackathon phases): 4 weeks\\\\n\\\\n**Key Activities:**\\\\n\\\\nWeek 1-2: Kick-off event and challenge briefing. Registration. \\\\nWeek 3: Workshops on app development, integration, and best practices. Pitch sessions and project submission.\\\\nWeek 4: Judging and winner announcement.\\\\n\\\\n# 6. KPIs and Impact\\\\n**Key Performance Indicators:**\\\\n\\\\n1. Number of participants: 150+\\\\n2. Number of projects developed: 100+\\\\n3. Engagement on social media and platform: 1000+ interactions\\\\n\\\\n**Community Impact:**\\\\n\\\\n1. Enhance the HOT App ecosystem with new features and ideas. \\\\n2. Strengthen the developer community around HOT App and Near ecosystem\\\\n\\\\n# 7. Budget and Funding\\\\n**Budget Breakdown:\\\\n**\\\\n\\\\nPrizes: $15,000\\\\nTotal Funding Requested: $15,000\\\\n\\\\n# 8. Bounties and Prizes\\\\nDetails:\\\\n\\\\n1st Place: Listing in HOT app and $7,000 USD\\\\n2nd Place: $5,000 USD\\\\n3rd Place: $3,000 USD\\\\n\\\\n# 9. Judging Criteria\\\\n**Evaluation Process:**\\\\n\\\\n1. Technological Implementation: Quality of software development.\\\\n2. Design: User experience and design.\\\\n3. Potential Impact: Impact on the HOT App ecosystem.\\\\n4. Quality of the Idea: Creativity and uniqueness.\\\\n5. Project Sustainability: Thoughtfulness and realism of the project plan.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n# 10. Marketing and Promotion\\\\n**Strategy:**\\\\n\\\\n1. Leverage social media channels and HOT App Telegram group.\\\\n2. Partner with tech communities and influencers.\\\\n3. Get support from media resourses like: Incrypted, 001k.Trade\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n# 11. Contact Information\\\\nContact Details:\\\\n\\\\nEmail: hackathon@pitchtalk.com\\\\nWebsite: HOT App Hackathon Page -> https://pitchtalk.com/en/events/Hot-App-Hackathon\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "pitchtalknft.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "15000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}
